metadata.title: USN-2321-1 -- OpenStack Neutron vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Liping Mao discovered that OpenStack Neutron did not properly handle requests for a large number of allowed address pairs. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2014-3555)  Zhi Kun Liu discovered that OpenStack Neutron incorrectly filtered certain tokens. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain authentication tokens used in REST requests. (CVE-2014-4615)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2321-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  neutron-plugin-nicira - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-ibm - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-openvswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-nec - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-l3-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-linuxbridge - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-ml2 - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-vpn-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-lbaas-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-vmware - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-oneconvergence-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-linuxbridge-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-mlnx-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-dhcp-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-hyperv - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-mlnx - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-openflow-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-midonet - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-ryu-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-cisco - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-metaplugin - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-server - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-common - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-openvswitch - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 python-neutron - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-plumgrid - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-ryu - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-oneconvergence - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-nec-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-metadata-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-bigswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-ibm-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-vpn-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-brocade - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 neutron-plugin-bigswitch - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
